title: Basil-stuffed chicken breasts
ingredients: ['4 skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets), about 140 g (5 oz) each', '100 g (3 1/2 oz) mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced', '1 tomato, thinly sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 bunch of fresh basil, about 20 g (1/2 oz)', '4 slices Parma ham, about 55 g (2 oz) in total', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper', 'Green salad', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '125 g (4 1/2 oz) pack gourmet lettuce selection or mixed salad leaves', '1 bunch of watercress, large stalks discarded']
